casebody.data:
Matthew Oliver ALFORD
v.
Secretary of Correction Theodis BECK Superintendent L.C.I. George Kenworthy. No. 558P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 4, 2005. Matthew Oliver Alford, Pro Se. William P. Hart, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of NC.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the application filed by Petitioner on the 4th day of October 2005 in this matter for Writ of Habeas Corpus, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court, Haywood County:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 4th day of October 2005."
